com.opera.core.systems.model

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opera.core.systems.model.Canvas

  • public class Canvas
extends Object
    A canvas object to use in taking screenshots of Opera's viewport. The screenshot can be relative to viewport or to the window.
